text:
Hey team,

I wanted to apologize for my recent absence due to health reasons. Unfortunately, I had to miss some classes during this time, and I understand the impact it may have had on our projects.

I'm back now and ready to work on Project Closeout if we decide so. I have a few tasks that need to be completed before graduation.

I'll be available tomorrow during Corey's hours to collaborate.

I want to express my gratitude for the incredible work you all have been doing on the projects. Your dedication and expertise in web development have truly impressed me. It was comfortable and enjoyable working with such a knowledgeable team. :heart:

elements.text:

text:
Hey Niko, thanks for sending this. Sorry to hear you've had some health struggles recently. I know it's hard to balance life along with all these course requirements. I think our group in general struggled to communicate proactively, and that certainly made it tough for us here at the end! 

Glad to see you're still planning to keep going - we've all put in so much effort these last few months and I want to see our whole group graduate.

I'm happy to review any PR's you make as you work on this final push.

text:
Hope everything is better Nikolai! 

I agree with Gabe, and also available to help review any PR’s!
